name: Iceberg
description:
We created this game as part of the Arctic Climate Game Jam http://climategamejam.org/. This is our first completed gamejam and we didn't finish during the time frame of the game jam. Players are faced with two choices: play the game and watch the iceberg melt, or exit the game and save it. In an effort to raise climate awareness, the goal of this game is to encourage players to think about how their consumption might effect the environment.

Let us know what you think on twitter @gamedevsquest!
